April 25, 1955
Dr. Frank Schooley, Director
NAEB Headquarters
University of Illinois
14 Gregory Rail
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Schooley :
I, personally, would be very pleased to have
the Air Meather Service produce a thirteen week
series on Meteorology and Climatology, perhaps
it would be a good idea, however, to have Lt. Spears
and his group send us an outline of two or three
typical programs. Having worked in Washington, D.C.
radio, I am familiar with the facilities and personnel
available for broadcasting. If the AWS used these
professional facilities and personnel, they would
be able to develop an interesting and worthwhile
program.
Sincerely,
6yyl/L.
Jim Slack
Network Acceptance Subcommittee
JS/eg
